DetDescr/src/EcalHexReadout.cxx

00001 #include "DetDescr/EcalHexReadout.h"
00002 #include "TList.h"
00003 
00004 namespace ldmx {
00005 
00006     EcalHexReadout::EcalHexReadout(double width, double side) {
00007         ecalMap = new TH2Poly();
00008 
00009         // Center a cell at (x,y)=(0,0) and ensure coverage up to/past width/2 in all 4 directions,
00010         // assuming each cell is lying on a side.
00011         unsigned ncellwide = width / (2. * side);
00012         unsigned ny = ncellwide + 1;
00013         unsigned nx = ncellwide + 4;
00014         double xstart = -((double) ncellwide + 0.5) * side;
00015         double ystart = -((double) ncellwide + 1) * side * sqrt(3) / 2;
00016 
00017         // std::cout << " -- Initialising HoneyComb with parameters: " << std::endl << " ---- (xstart,ystart) = (" << xstart << "," << ystart << ")" << ", side = " << side << ", nx = " << nx << ", ny=" << ny << std::endl;
00018 
00019         buildMap(xstart, ystart, side, ny, nx);
00020 
00021         TListIter next(ecalMap->GetBins());
00022         TObject *obj = 0;
00023         TH2PolyBin *polyBin = 0;
00024 
00025         while ((obj = next())) {
00026             polyBin = (TH2PolyBin*) obj;
00027             int id = polyBin->GetBinNumber();
00028             double x = (polyBin->GetXMax() + polyBin->GetXMin()) / 2.;
00029             double y = (polyBin->GetYMax() + polyBin->GetYMin()) / 2.;
00030             cellIdtoCoords.insert(std::pair<int,XYCoords>(id, std::make_pair(x, y)));
00031         }
00032     }
00033 
00034     void EcalHexReadout::buildMap(Double_t xstart, Double_t ystart, Double_t a, Int_t k, Int_t s) {
00035         // Add the bins
00036         Double_t numberOfHexagonsInAColumn;
00037         Double_t x[6], y[6];
00038         Double_t xloop, yloop, ytemp;
00039         Double_t sqrt_three = sqrt(3);
00040         xloop = xstart;
00041         yloop = ystart + a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00042 
00043         for (int sCounter = 0; sCounter < s; sCounter++) {
00044             ytemp = yloop; // Resets the temp variable
00045 
00046             // Determine the number of hexagons in that column
00047             if (sCounter % 2 == 0) {
00048                 numberOfHexagonsInAColumn = k;
00049             } else {
00050                 numberOfHexagonsInAColumn = k - 1;
00051             }
00052 
00053             for (int kCounter = 0; kCounter < numberOfHexagonsInAColumn; kCounter++) {
00054 
00055                 // Go around the hexagon
00056                 x[0] = xloop;
00057                 y[0] = ytemp;
00058                 x[1] = x[0] + a / 2.0;
00059                 y[1] = y[0] + a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00060                 x[2] = x[1] + a;
00061                 y[2] = y[1];
00062                 x[3] = x[2] + a / 2.0;
00063                 y[3] = y[1] - a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00064                 x[4] = x[2];
00065                 y[4] = y[3] - a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00066                 x[5] = x[1];
00067                 y[5] = y[4];
00068                 ecalMap->AddBin(6, x, y);
00069 
00070                 // Go up
00071                 ytemp += a * sqrt_three;
00072             }
00073 
00074             // Increment the starting position
00075             if (sCounter % 2 == 0)
00076                 yloop += a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00077             else
00078                 yloop -= a * sqrt_three / 2.0;
00079             xloop += 1.5 * a;
00080         }
00081     }
00082 
00083     std::vector<int> EcalHexReadout::getInnerRingCellIds(int cellID) {
00084         return {
00085             cellID + SHIFT_UP, 
00086             cellID + SHIFT_DOWN, 
00087             cellID + SHIFT_RIGHT_UP, 
00088             cellID + SHIFT_RIGHT_DOWN, 
00089             cellID + SHIFT_LEFT_UP, 
00090             cellID + SHIFT_LEFT_DOWN
00091         };
00092     }
00093 
00094     std::vector<int> EcalHexReadout::getOuterRingCellIds(int cellID) {
00095         return {
00096             cellID + 2*SHIFT_UP, 
00097             cellID + SHIFT_RIGHT_UP + SHIFT_UP, 
00098             cellID + SHIFT_LEFT_UP + SHIFT_UP, 
00099             cellID + 2*SHIFT_DOWN, 
00100             cellID + SHIFT_RIGHT_DOWN + SHIFT_DOWN, 
00101             cellID + SHIFT_LEFT_DOWN + SHIFT_DOWN, 
00102             cellID + 2*SHIFT_RIGHT_UP, 
00103             cellID + 2*SHIFT_RIGHT_UP + SHIFT_DOWN, 
00104             cellID + 2*SHIFT_RIGHT_UP + SHIFT_DOWN, 
00105             cellID + 2*SHIFT_LEFT_UP, 
00106             cellID + 2*SHIFT_LEFT_UP + SHIFT_DOWN, 
00107             cellID + 2*SHIFT_LEFT_UP + SHIFT_DOWN
00108         };
00109     }
